Reviews.Title: Maybe should have ordered one at a time...
Reviews.Author: Curious World
Reviews.Content: We ordered 2 of these phones, phone described as "like new".  Perhaps my idea of "like new" differs from someone else's view.  One of the phones had dents and scratches (as if it had never been in a phone case).  I contacted the seller with the intention to send the phone back.  They were helpful and responded quickly.  We were going to send the phone back, but decided at the last minute to keep it (still was a good deal for what we paid for the 2 phones). I think the seller should be clear that only one of the phones is "like new" whenever you order more than one.  Also, neither phone was unlocked as stated in the description.  My husband had to unlock the phones (pain in the rear).  The "like new" phone had an updated operating system, while the scratched and dented phone had an older operating system.  Just make sure you understand what you're getting when you order, and maybe do 2 seperate orders when ordering more than one phone.

Reviews.Title: very very very disappointing buy
Reviews.Author: Shawn Rolle
Reviews.Content: This is the worse of the worse buy ever. The phone I got was nothing as described. It was sooooooo banged up that I could hardly reconize it at first. It did not come unlocked,network was blocked as though the provider thinks that it is stoten or something. I just cann't believe that something like this is being sold. Big regret.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Bold 9650 Excellent Item - Good Quality - Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Phone Reviewer "Cell Phone Reviewer"
Reviews.Content: Perfect Blackberry 9650 unlocked , I bought this Blackberry 9650 unlocked to use in Central America because I travel a lot, and it arrived Blackberry 9650 unlocked brand new condition with all nice accessories for free. It worked every country I went to with all different networks -  in Venezuela, Columbia, Equador, Peru, Panama, Brazil, Argentina, Mexico, Carribian, Guatemala, Chile, Urguay, Paraguay, Belize, Hounduras, Dominican Repluplic.Overall Great Item, thank you for the Blackberry Unlocked New 9650,great accessories packages.Perfecto blackberry Libre 9650,compre este blackberry Libre 9650, para usarlo en cento America por q viajo mucho,y lo resivi completa  mente nuevocon todos sus bonitos accesorios  gratuitos.trabajo en todos los paises a donde fui  con todas las diferentes networks- en Venezuela, Colombia, Ecuador, peru, panama, brazil, argentina, Mexico, El caribe, Guatemala, Chile, Uruguay, Paraguay, Belize, Honduras, Republica DominicanaEs un grandioso articulo, y grasias por el Blackberry Libre Nuevo 9650 grandioso paqute de accesorios.
